js 之 ExtJs总结

常用关键字

key words How to get
view this.getView()
viewModel this.getViewModel()
grid this.view.up(‘grid’)
store this.getView().getStore(‘gridstore’);
refernce this.getViewModel().lookupReference(‘referenceName’);
